name: coding-challenges
description: A comprehensive collection of coding challenges from CodingChallenges.fyi and experimental projects

scripts.install:all: pnpm run install:ex-04 && pnpm run install:ex-05 && pnpm run install:ex-07
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:ex-04 && pnpm run build:ex-05 && pnpm run build:ex-07
scripts.build:ex-04: cd ex-04-mobile-ide-app && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.build:ex-05: cd ex-05-browser-ide-v1 && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.build:ex-07: cd ex-07-gemini-photo-watermark-remover && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.clean:all: pnpm run clean:ex-04 && pnpm run clean:ex-05 && pnpm run clean:ex-07
scripts.site:preview: pnpm run site:build && pnpm run preview

comments.build:all: Builds all challenges that require a build step (TypeScript, React, Vite, etc.)
comments.note: When adding new challenges with build scripts, add them to build:all and create individual build:challenge-name scripts

author: Ankur Mursalin
